review_data.title: Great drinks

review_data.title: Great place to unwind.

review_data.title: Relax and enjoy at Bar & Lounge 42

review_data.title: What a place!!

review_data.title: Chief Operating Officer

review_data.title: Great service, friendly staff.

review_data.title: Whiskey
